attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mersea Island is an island that relys on many things, and fishing is one of them. My father used to be a fishermen. He loved his job, but was forced to work ashore when his European mates had a better deal than their communities. Their goverments looked after the local interests. Why can't my dad do a job that he does well, and sustain a family way of life?
